query:
ALTER TABLE generated_websites 
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS onboardingStatus ENUM('pending', 'in_progress', 'completed') DEFAULT 'pending',
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS hasLegalPages BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS subscriptionStatus ENUM('none', 'active', 'canceled', 'past_due') DEFAULT 'none';
